name: Roll Together (Homies_Interactive)
description:
To make the discord bot, follow this tutorial and copy the javascript file into your code. Right-click on the server text channel and copy ID. Paste it into the if statements in the javascript file. 

Also, install input library here http://robotjs.io/docs/

If you are the host, "r" is to manually restart the level. Up Arrow is to boost power and down Arrow does the opposite. 

It will be a miracle if you somehow get it working, but if you do, have fun!
